definition: an opening that allows the passage of liquids or grain, talk in a noisy, excited, or declamatory manner
details:
noun
- an opening that allows the passage of liquids or grain
verb
- talk in a noisy, excited, or declamatory manner
= synonyms: jabber, rave, rant, mouth off, rabbit on
- gush forth in a sudden stream or jet
= synonyms: gush, spirt, spurt
